attributes.action: make representations to the railway companies that they should refund customers using replacement bus services 30 per cent of the fare paid
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Railway Companies are currently allowed to charge their full normal tariff yet replace trains with less comfortable and less convenient bus services that take far longer than the advertised time to complete the journey concerned.  This is unfair on customers affected, who should therefore be compensated with a partial refund of the cost of their tickets.
